text: Emil Feuchtmann Pérez (born 1 June 1983) is a Chilean handball player for Grand Nancy Métropole Handball and the Chilean national team.EHF profile2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster He is the brother of Erwin and Harald who are both handball players themselves. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:People from Punta Arenas Category:Chilean male handball players Category:Chilean people of German descent Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Chilean expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Chilean expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Pan American Games medalists in handball Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Chile Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Handball players at the 2003 Pan American Games Category:Handball players at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Handball players at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Handball players at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:South American Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games
title: Emil Feuchtmann
